meaning_str.bing:
adj. 无法；没有所需技能（或力量、时间、知识等）；未能
网络. 不能的；不会的；不能够的

无法；没有所需技能（或力量、时间、知识等）；未能
不能的；不会的；不能够的

无能力的；不能的；不会的；无法的；不具备所需能力的

1.en: There will be problems at all levels of difficulty, so no student should be unable to solve close to six problems each week.
1.cn: 作业会有不同难度的问题，所以应该所有学生均可在每星期解决接近六条问题。

2.en: At the time I was drunk on lack of sleep and unable to make a coherent reply to that - hence the reason I'm writing this article.
2.cn: 当时我失眠又醉酒，没法给出个像样的答案，这也是我为什么会写这篇文章的理由。

3.en: She felt sluggish, bloated, and unable to run at an intense pace--except when a Port-a-Potty came into view.
3.cn: 她感到乏力，臃肿，无法跑出高强度配速---除非看到洗手间。

0.en: Sir, we were unable to acquire the droid on Jakku.
0.cn: 长官，我们没能在贾库星抓捕到那个机器人。

1.en: As expected, she was unable to complete the puzzle at all.
1.cn: 不出所料，她根本无法完成游戏。

2.en: Unable to sway the others, he decided to leave the school.
2.cn: 他因为无法说服其他人，因此离开了这所学校。

3.en: Therefore, Stan is unable to use self-control. And so he acts out aggressively.
3.cn: 因此，斯坦没有自制力，所以他总是霸道专横。

4.en: If you are unable to protect yourself in the kingdom, it is I who will be killed.
4.cn: 如果你在这个王国里无法自保，被处死的，将会是我。

5.en: You are no longer a member of the military. You're unable to attend this meeting. I'm sorry.
5.cn: 您不再是军人。你不能参加此审议，我很遗憾。

6.en: Sunlight is often unable to pierce the glue. Even plants struggle to photosynthesis on the worst days.
6.cn: 黑霾压城，阳光往往无法穿透。在最糟糕的时候，即使植物也只能勉强进行光合作用。

7.en: And the whole thing was designed by the same brilliant minds who were unable to capture Rocky and Bullwinkle.
7.cn: 而设计这火箭的人可是连飞鼠洛奇和驯鹿布尔温克都抓不到的“聪明”俄国人呢。

8.en: Cactus 1549, if we can get it for you, do you wanna try to land runway 1 -3? We are unable. We may end up in the Hudson.
8.cn: 全美航空1549，如果我们能给你清空跑道，你能尝试降落在跑道13吗？没法办到，我们很可能会迫降哈德逊河。

9.en: But first, I will raise a Sixth Amendment issue. I'm unable to confront my accuser, a non-human entity, to wit, a camera.
9.cn: 但首先，我要提出第六条修正案[美国权利法案]，我无法与控方对峙，因为控方是一台非人类机器，也就是摄像机。

10.en: And finally that you were unable to consummate the marriage. Well, that makes sense since you're gay and addicted to heroin.
10.cn: 还有你无法履行夫妻间的义务，这也难怪，你是同志，又注射海洛因。

11.en: In the biblical story of the Tower of Babel, all of humanity once spoke a single language until they suddenly split into many groups unable to understand each other.
11.cn: 在圣经故事巴别塔中，所有人类都讲同一种语言，直到他们突然分裂成多个相互之间都听不懂的族群。

12.en: And even if someone slipped a chill pill into their collective drink, you would still be legally unable to work for the next two years. That's for any studio, any network. Television or film.
12.cn: 即使有人往他们公共饮用水里放了镇静药，在法律约束下，你未来两年都无法工作。无论是在哪家工作室、电视台、电视剧或是电影。

13.en: So, what's up? Well, Penny is on her way to perform in a one-night showcase production of rent, which we are unable to attend, because we're going to a symposium on molecular positronium given by Dr. Emil Farman Farmian.
13.cn: 怎么了？潘妮正要去一个出租用品展示会进行表演，而我们不能去了，因为我们要去参加由伊米尔·法尔曼法尔米安博士主讲的关于分子正负的研讨会。
